acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill Java native types
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillJavaNativeTypes

tag.name: Basic types/Podam factory basic types test

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class java.lang.Integer
Then the integer field should not be null
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class java.util.GregorianCalendar
Then the calendar object should not be null
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class java.util.Date
Then the Date object should not be null
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class java.math.BigDecimal
Then the Object should not be null
